talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Velskud$
Geraint.
He looks dead. The Nest is damaged as well.

$Court Sorceress Kayleen${action:Talk}
Hmph. I knew it! That raccoon-faced man is nothing but trouble! Anyone with a sly face like the Bishop cannot be trusted at all!

$King Cassius$
What in the world is happening? Oh,what will the great King Cassius, my father do in such a situation?

$Duke Stuart$
I can't believe it. The Prophet should never be used as a weapon...

$General Douglas$
I need to retrieve some critical reports now. We'll talk later.

$Royal Elite Guard$
Emergency, emergency!
{user_nick}, I'm sorry but there's an urgent report.

$King Cassius$
What in the world is happening? Oh,what will the great King Cassius, my father do in such a situation?
(Check on Rose at the Undergrounds of the Royal Castle)

$Duke Stuart$
That's just too bad. The Prophet is such a disappointing weapon indeed.
(Check on Rose at the Undergrounds of the Royal Castle)

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
I knew it! That raccoon-faced man is nothing but trouble!
(Check on Rose at the Undergrounds of the Royal Castle)

$General Douglas$
I need to receive some important documents right now. We can talk later.
(Check on Rose at the Undergrounds of the Royal Castle)

$Elite Royal Guard$
Go ahead and do what you must, adventurer.
The news has caused an outbreak of havoc right now.
(Check on Rose at the Undergrounds of the Royal Castle)

$Velskud$
I'm here to slay the throat of Ignacio, but he has already escaped with the Descendant of the Ancients.

$Velskud$
Everything is in a mess because of you.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What do you mean about apostles? Where is Rose and the Bishop?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
You're annoying. Just like the one who was here.
I hope you're smart enough to enlighten yourself without my help.

$Velskud$
Now, if you'd excuse me.
I'm too busy right now for your worthless crap.

$Velskud$
Now, if you'd excuse me. BR>I'm too busy right now for your worthless crap.

$Elite Royal Guard${action:Talk}
{user_nick}! The Prophet... she'd disappeared?
The guards raided the castle undergrounds but she's nowhere to be found!

$Elite Royal Guard$
The whereabouts of Bishop Ignacio is unknown too. The Royal Castle is in a state of emergency right now!

$Elite Royal Guard$
Things are in a mess right now.
General Douglas is passing down instructions so see him.

$Elite Royal Guard${action:Talk}
Bishop Ignacio and the Prophet are both nowhere to be found.
General Douglas is passing down instructions now so go see him.

$General Douglas${action:Talk}
There you are! You were only away for a short while but all hell has broken loose.
The Prophet has disappeared!

$General Douglas$
Believe it or not, Bishop Ignacio and the Prophet are both gone. A scout has tracked and reported their location... and it seems they are no longer in Saint Haven.

$General Douglas$
We have all been hoodwinked by the evil Ignacio. He planned to take the Prophet away from the very beginning! Right under our noses!

$General Douglas$
Perhaps Court Sorceress Kayleen can tell you more.
My troops and I are gonna pursue that two-faced bishop.

$General Douglas$
Perhaps Court Sorceress Kayleen can tell you more.
My troops and I are gonna pursue that two-faced bishop.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Cassius is staring into space. His eyes look lost.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$King Cassius$
The Bishop.... He took the Prophet and betrayed us. I don't believe it... *Sniff* Uncle Stuart says you can't trust anyone but family... I think he's right... *Sniff*.

$King Cassius$
You are a loyal to the Kingdom? I'm not sure if I can trust you anymore... *sniffle*...
What about General Douglas? I hope he's loyal to the Kingdom too... It would be nice to believe that.(Cassius is fidgetting nervously.)

$Duke Stuart${action:Stand2}
Our young King Cassius is confused and disappointed right now.
This is not the time to annouce news about the Prophet and the Gold Dragon.

$Duke Stuart$
The Prophet and the Gold Dragon are gone, but we shall keep this a secret.
Now that the Black Dragon has been defeated, nothing really matters much now.

$Duke Stuart$
Let's also stay quiet theBishop Ignacio's situation.
I hope you know what I mean...

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
I knew it! That raccoon-faced man is nothing but trouble!
(Check on Rose at the Undergrounds of the Royal Castle)

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
This mess is all because of you! Your naivety made you trust anyone and everyone and now the racoon-jerk has kidnapped the Prophet!
I knew this would happen!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I will go there and do a check</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
I overheard someone mention something about the Bishop spotted at the Nameless Tyrant Tomb.
Don't you think you should be heading there, if you feel even a bit responsible for his whole mess-up?

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
Don't make the mistake of thinking we can lend you our powers whenever you ask for it.
We don't pick up all jobs you know.

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
We have various reports in different areas. Looks like YOU have to search them out one by one. After all, it's all your fault that the raccoon has kidnapped the Prophet!

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
What? You're still idling around although this whole mess is your fault? Move your lazy bum to the Nameless Tyrant Tomb now! I hope you're not expecting my help, because you will be in for a huge disappointment. Hmph.

$General Douglas$
My men are out scouting and verifying all locations indicated in the report but it's gonna be more difficult than it looks.
Court Sorceress Kayleen has been asked to check out the Nameless Tyrant Tomb area. You're going there too?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You knew it in advance! Why couldn't you just tell me?!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Court Sorceress Kayleen${action:Talk}
Lost sight of the bishop raccoon eh? Hmph! I knew it!
The bishop is a cunning snake and you're a brainless bat! !

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
I'm not your teacher. I'm not obliged to teach you anything at all.
Don't just stand there. Think of how you're gonna clear up this mess you're responsible for!

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
There goes my chance to boast in front of General Douglas. Argh.. This is annoying indeed.
(Kayleen mumbles and grumbles while looking at the General's direction.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(The General places his hands onto your shoulders encouragingly.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$General Douglas${action:Talk}
Hmm...nothing so far.
The sly bishop fooled everyone. Don't blame yourself.

$General Douglas$
I can see your allegiance to Saint Haven is true.
It's just a shame that things like this have to happen...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Could it be because of the Leviathan's blood?)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$General Douglas$
I'm not sure if its your poor health, or the tough battles so far... but you're looking rather pale...
(The General peers at you with concern.)
Are you feeling alright?

$General Douglas$
Could you be worn out from the fight with the Black Dragon?
To be safe, maybe you should visit Master Archer Ithilien, and let her have a look at you. She might be able to help.
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

journal.title: The Unpredictable Meeting
journal.contents:
Velskud may have an idea where the Prophet may be. Let's have a chat with him.

Underground of the Royal Castle → Velskud

journal.title: Royal Castle's Mayhem
journal.contents:
Velskud did not seem to understand my question one bit. Perhaps it's wiser to listen in on the stories spread by the soldiers.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Royal Elite Guards
journal.destination: Talk to other people at the Royal Castle
journal.todo_msg: Ask around about the recent incident.

journal.title: Bishop Disappearance
journal.contents:
From the bits and pieces of information I've gathered, it seems the Bishop had disappeared with the Prophet. Perhaps General Douglas could tell me more...

Saint Haven Royal Castle → General Douglas
journal.todo_msg: Find out from General Douglas about what had happened.

journal.title: The Situation
journal.contents:
Wow, Bishop Ignacio and Rose are both gone... vanished without a trace. Find out more from Court Sorceress Kayleen.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Court Sorceress Kayleen
journal.todo_msg: Please talk to Court Sorceress Kayleen.

journal.title: Finding the Whereabouts
journal.contents:
Track down the Bishop's whereabouts at Nameless Tyrant Tomb.

Hermalte Port (Dark Mines Access) → Nameless Tyrant Tomb
journal.todo_msg: Visit Nameless Tyrant Tomb to investigate the disappearance of Bishop Ignacio.

journal.title: Tracking Failed
journal.contents:
No clues found. It's almost like the Bishop and Rose disappeared into thin air. Report this to Court Sorceress Kayleen and General Douglas.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → General Douglas
journal.todo_msg: The Bishop could not be found. Report to General Douglas.
